directions: Heat oven to 200°F. Wrap pitas in foil and place in oven. Toss next 11 ingredients in a bowl. Whisk juice and oil in another bowl, drizzle over salad, then toss and divide among 4 plates. Remove pitas from oven, cut into quarters and serve 2 with each salad.
ingredients: 1 can (10 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 green bell pepper, cored, seeded and cut into strips
2 cups bite-size, skinless pieces roasted chicken
title: Greek Chicken Salad
